		<hkobject name="#0435" class="hkbExpressionDataArray" signature="0x4b9ee1a2">
			<hkparam name="expressionsData" numelements="1">
				<hkobject>
					<hkparam name="expression">bowZoomAmt = IsAttacking * clamp( (bowZoomAmt + (ZoomAcc * TimeDelta * ((iWantBlock *  bowZoom ) - bowZoomAmt) * clamp((1 - cos( bowZoomAmt * 3.14/2) ), 0.1, 1) ) ), 0, 1)</hkparam>
					<hkparam name="assignmentVariableIndex">-1</hkparam>
					<hkparam name="assignmentEventIndex">-1</hkparam>
					<hkparam name="eventMode">EVENT_MODE_SEND_ONCE</hkparam>
				</hkobject>
			</hkparam>
		</hkobject>
